timeline.headline: Score like Sachin
timeline.text:
Content appears infinite? Don't know how to start? Let us then introduce an alternate innovative approach to browsing.

Play the game and notch up runs. And the better you perform, the better the content that gets revealed...

date.headline: Sachin's entry into cricket
date.text: At 15 years of age, Sachin makes his first class debut. And, hold your breath, scores a century on Ranji Trophy debut, a century on Duleep Trophy debut, and a century on Irani Trophy debut. Still, the only batsman ever to achieve this triple.

date.headline: Sachin plays a masterful innings
date.text: Sachin scores an unbeaten 100 off just 76 balls as India prepare for the World Cup campaign with Chappell's coaching methods splitting the country down the middle.

date.headline: Farewell, and thank you
date.text: Sachin's 200th Test, against the West Indies at the Wankhede, will be his last. He has carried India's pride on his shoulders, far longer than most of us can imagine...
